import React, { useState } from 'react' export default function About() { const [myStyle, setMyStyle] = useState({ color: "black", backgroundColor: "white", }); const [btnText, setBtnText] = useState('Enable Dark Mode') const toggleStyle = ()=>{ if(myStyle.color === 'black'){ setMyStyle({ color: 'white', backgroundColor: 'black', border: '1px solid white' }) setBtnText('Enable Light Mode') } else{ setMyStyle({ color: 'black', backgroundColor: 'white' }) setBtnText("Enable Dark Mode"); } } return (

About Us

TextUtils gives you a way to analyse your text quickly and efficiently.Be it word count, character count or spaces

TextUtils is afree character counter tool that provides instant character count & word count statistics for a given text. TextUtils reports the number of words and characters. Thus it is suitable for writing text with word/ character limit.
